info.name: Eclisse
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Vico Magistretti

MATERIALS:
Eclisse's story originates from a simple intuition and from very few marks of a read pen on a metro ticket. As can be noticed looking carefully at Magistretti's sketches, the little lamp is designed in its entirely there are very little details and these are never constructive, but mostly of proportion, helping to highlight and understand the relations between the parts. "The good details should come from the use of the object they are a logical consequence of the proposition. The details are the easiest thing, it's a lot more difficult to do something that desires to express help. I think that Eclisse is beautiful enough because it attempts to express something useful like the conditioning of light" (DDN n. 59/1998 Foundation studio museum Vico Magistretti)

INFORMATIONS:
LED Total power 4,5W warm white 3000Kn
Lighting Output 209lmn
or HALOn
Max 1x18W (E14) - ECO or FLUO max 1x5W (E14)
